name: Moments from the End of Summer (tiny prototype ver.)
name_original: Moments from the End of Summer (tiny prototype ver.)
description:
Now with working download link!

I had two weeks to make a game for a game jam, and I did not manage my time well. This is what I made.

I'm going to be coming back to this project at some point! I spent a lot more time planning than I did actually creating a tangible thing, and I have a lot of ideas that I want to make into an actual game eventually. There are a couple unused sprites in the image directory for this tiny little demo, including a few for a yet-unseen character.
